headline.main: Black Union Soldier Buried in Nevada Finally Honored
headline.print_headline: Black Union Soldier Buried in Nevada Finally Honored

docs.snippet: A runaway slave who joined the Union Army during the Civil War and lost a leg after being wounded in battle finally received recognition Sunday, nearly 100 years after he died in Nevada....
docs.lead_paragraph: A runaway slave who joined the Union Army during the Civil War and lost a leg after being wounded in battle finally received recognition Sunday, nearly 100 years after he died in Nevada.

docs.snippet: An assured pole-to-flag win, without safety cars or strategy blunders, was just what Lewis Hamilton needed in Canada on Sunday -- even if relief was too strong a word....
docs.lead_paragraph: An assured pole-to-flag win, without safety cars or strategy blunders, was just what Lewis Hamilton needed in Canada on Sunday -- even if relief was too strong a word.

headline.main: Big Stars Held in Check So Far in Stanley Cup
headline.print_headline: Big Stars Held in Check So Far in Stanley Cup

docs.snippet: One point. That is the combined total for Jonathan Toews, Patrick Kane and Steven Stamkos through two games of the Stanley Cup Final....
docs.lead_paragraph: One point. That is the combined total for Jonathan Toews, Patrick Kane and Steven Stamkos through two games of the Stanley Cup Final.

headline.main: Egypt Ex-Official Says FIFA's Warner Sought Money, Citing Influence in World Cup Selection
headline.print_headline: Egypt Ex-Official Says FIFA's Warner Sought Money, Citing Influence in World Cup Selection

docs.snippet: The former head of Egypt's football federation said on Sunday that ex-FIFA Vice President Jack Warner asked for $7 million from Egypt, suggesting it could help with Egypt's bid to host the 2010 World Cup....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former head of Egypt's football federation said on Sunday that ex-FIFA Vice President Jack Warner asked for $7 million from Egypt, suggesting it could help with Egypt's bid to host the 2010 World Cup.

headline.main: Brazil Extend Winning Run to Nine With Win Over Mexico
headline.print_headline: Brazil Extend Winning Run to Nine With Win Over Mexico

docs.snippet: Brazil took their winning run under coach Dunga to nine on Sunday when first-half goals gave them a comfortable 2-0 win over Mexico in Sao Paulo....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil took their winning run under coach Dunga to nine on Sunday when first-half goals gave them a comfortable 2-0 win over Mexico in Sao Paulo.

headline.main: Home Run: Antron Brown Races to 50th NHRA Victory
headline.print_headline: Home Run: Antron Brown Races to 50th NHRA Victory

docs.snippet: Antron Brown raced to his 50th NHRA victory Sunday, beating Brittany Force in the Top Fuel final in the Toyota NHRA Summernationals at his home track....
docs.lead_paragraph: Antron Brown raced to his 50th NHRA victory Sunday, beating Brittany Force in the Top Fuel final in the Toyota NHRA Summernationals at his home track.

headline.main: Pettersen Birdies 16 and 17 to Win Manulife LPGA Classic
headline.print_headline: Pettersen Birdies 16 and 17 to Win Manulife LPGA Classic

docs.snippet: Suzann Pettersen paid tribute to new coach Butch Harmon after winning the Manulife LPGA Classic by a stroke in Ontario on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Suzann Pettersen paid tribute to new coach Butch Harmon after winning the Manulife LPGA Classic by a stroke in Ontario on Sunday.

headline.main: Pena Nieto casts vote in Mexico election as protesters burn ballot papers
headline.sub: Pena Nieto casts vote in Mexico election as protesters burn ballot papers

docs.snippet: Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto casts his vote in legislative elections that will determine if his party keeps its slim working majority in the lower house of Congress. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto casts his vote in legislative elections that will determine if his party keeps its slim working majority in the lower house of Congress. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Sevilla Midfielder Vidal to Join Barcelona
headline.print_headline: Sevilla Midfielder Vidal to Join Barcelona

docs.snippet: - Sevilla midfielder Aleix Vidal will join treble winners Barcelona pending a medical for a reported 23 million euros (16.73 million pounds), the Catalan club said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: - Sevilla midfielder Aleix Vidal will join treble winners Barcelona pending a medical for a reported 23 million euros (16.73 million pounds), the Catalan club said on Sunday.

headline.main: Spain Ex-Premier Arrives in Caracas to Help Jailed Leaders
headline.print_headline: Spain Ex-Premier Arrives in Caracas to Help Jailed Leaders

docs.snippet: A former Spanish prime minister has arrived in Venezuela, where he intends to help lawyers defending imprisoned opposition leader Leopoldo Lopez and Caracas mayor Antonio Ledezma, who is under house arrest....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Spanish prime minister has arrived in Venezuela, where he intends to help lawyers defending imprisoned opposition leader Leopoldo Lopez and Caracas mayor Antonio Ledezma, who is under house arrest.
